Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

logo.title: Company Logo
logo.description: Upload your company logo. It will appear on contracts, invoices, and documents.
logo.hint: PNG, JPG or SVG. Max 2MB. Recommended: 200x200px

contractTerms.title: Contract Terms & Conditions
contractTerms.description: Customize the terms and conditions that appear on rental contracts. Each line will be displayed as a separate term.
contractTerms.label: Terms & Conditions
contractTerms.placeholder:
Enter your contract terms, one per line:
• Collision Damage (CDW) coverage applies to...
• The vehicle must be returned with the same fuel level
• Smoking in the vehicle is prohibited
contractTerms.hint: Tip: Start each term with • or number for better formatting. These terms will appear in the contract PDF.

users.title: Team Members
users.description: Manage users who have access to your organization.
users.addUserDescription: Create a new user account for your organization.
users.name: Name
users.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.description: Manage your credit cards and payment preferences.
paymentMethods.deletedDesc: The payment method has been successfully removed.
paymentMethods.defaultUpdatedDesc: Your primary payment method has been updated.
paymentMethods.invalidLast4: Enter the last 4 digits of the card
paymentMethods.addDescription: Add a new credit card for payments.

payments.title: Payment History
payments.emptyDesc: You haven't made any payments yet.

language.title: Language & Region
language.description: Change your preferred interface language. Your country and currency are fixed based on your registration.
language.countryReadOnly: Your country is set during registration and determines your pricing. Contact support to change it.
language.languageDescription: Choose the language for the application interface.

referrals.title: Referral Program
referrals.description: Invite other companies to use our platform. For every 5 companies that subscribe, you get 1 year for free!
referrals.shareCode: Share this code with your network. They enter it during signup.

pricing.title: Pricing Rules
pricing.description: Set base daily rental prices by vehicle category and season.
pricing.basePricingDesc: Daily rental prices in EUR for each vehicle category and season.
pricing.seasonDatesDesc: Define when each season applies. Prices will be calculated automatically.
pricing.seasonNote: Contact support to customize season date ranges.
